verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
verses.translation_en: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
verses.translation_zh: . 难道你不知道你的主怎样处治象的主人们吗？

verses.translation_en: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?
verses.translation_zh: 难道他没有使他们的计谋, 变成无益的吗？

verses.translation_en: And He sent against them birds in flocks,
verses.translation_zh: 他曾派遣成群的鸟去伤他们,

verses.translation_en: Striking them with stones of hard clay,
And He made them like eaten straw.
verses.translation_zh: 使他们变成吃剩的干草一样。
